snippet.title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown | The Explorer Trailer
snippet.description:
📰 Read more about exploration, release date, and much more: discover our Winter Update with new details on the future of Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1249970/view/4173218293858269842 

🏝️ Explore, alone or with friends, and discover the riches Hong Kong Island has to offer. 

Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is a racing game and lifestyle experience on Hong Kong Island, recreated at 1:1 scale. 

On Hong Kong Island, where dreams become reality, Radiant has created new standards of luxury. This little-known but highly influential organization has invited its members to compete in an extraordinary competition: the Solar Crown. Few know what the group's motives are, but it's clear what they value: prestige, a love of cars, and competition. 

Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown will be available in 2024 on PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S.

-------------------------------
